column3: All schools in the district will be closed today due to heavy snowfall. Stay safe and warm!

column1: New Art Exhibit at the Museum
column3: A new art exhibit featuring works by local artists will be opening at the museum this weekend. Don't miss it!

column1: Charity Run Raises $10 000 for Cancer Research
column3: The annual charity run for cancer research was a huge success, raising over $10,000 for the cause. Thanks to all the participants and sponsors!
